goal.en: Numerical analysis is the study of algorithms that use numerical approximation for the problems of mathematical analysis. It involves methods striving to derive approximate solutions for problems rather than exact ones. Widely applicable across engineering, physical sciences, medicine, business, and even the arts. Numerical analysis aims to design and scrutinize techniques yielding precise yet approximate solutions for challenging problems.
goal.ch: 數值分析是研究使用數值逼近解決數學分析問題的算法。它探討的是透過方法來尋求問題的近似解，而非確切解。廣泛應用於工程、物理科學、醫學、商業甚至藝術領域。數值分析旨在設計和審查能夠為複雜問題提供精確但近似解的技術。
